description:
On her first day in high school, Himeno introduces herself to the class by lining up the mugs her late mother made.
Her classmate Mika knows her mothers works, so she takes her to the pottery club.
Taken in by the smell of the clay she shouldn`t know yet, Himeno goes in for her first attempt at pottery.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: はじめまして! 陶芸部
